title: Michael Robartes and the Dancer
description: Published during the blossoming of Yeats's maturity, between The Wild Swans at Coole (1919) and The Tower (1928), Michael Robartes and the Dancer (1920) includes poems that confronted central political, personal, and philosophical issues. This volume presents all the extant manuscripts for the poems in the collection, which Yeats wrote between 1914 and 1919, a critical period that included his marriage.
author: W.B. Yeats
